product_name: Eagle Creek Pack-It Specter Starter Set
long_description: A must-have for any frequent traveler, the Eagle Creek Pack-It(TM) Specter Starter Set includes a garment folder, cube and half cube for ultralight organization. Items are made of ultralight silnylon ripstop (silicone-impregnated nylon) that resists water, staining and tearing. Translucent fabric allows visibility for quick identification of items. Garment folder holds 8-12 shirts and pants; wings compress with 2 rip-and-stick closures. Includes a lightweight plastic board for you to use as a guide in folding clothing items so they fit neatly into the folder (directions are imprinted on the folder). Cubes keep rolled-up socks, underwear and other clothes neatly stowed in your luggage. Each of the 3 items in the Eagle Creek Pack-It(TM) Specter Starter Set has a carry handle.
short_description: A must-have for any frequent traveler, the Eagle Creek Pack-It(TM) Specter Starter Set includes a garment folder, cube and half cube for ultralight organization.
